articles.title: Latino Creatives Call for 'Accountability and Equity in Casting' - Variety
articles.description: More than 100 Latino creatives including Eva Longoria and John Leguizamo have signed an open letter to Hollywood calling for equity in casting.

articles.title: “Little Rascals” child star declares he's now a 'radical Catholic extremist' living off the grid after giving away savings - Yahoo
articles.description: Bug Hall, who also described himself as a "medieval moralist," said he left Hollywood following his arrest in June 2020 for allegedly inhaling air duster.

articles.title: 'The Blind Side' Star Quinton Aaron Suffered Spinal Stroke - TMZ
articles.description: "The Blind Side" star Quinton Aaron's family is revealing what led to his hospitalization ... they tell us he suffered a spinal stroke.

articles.title: Quentin Tarantino Named Him The 'Weakest F**king Actor.' He’s Finally Spoken Out, And It’s Good. - HuffPost
articles.description: The “Pulp Fiction” director got backlash for his brutal criticism in which he called the actor the “limpest dick in the world.”

articles.title: ‘ICE Out’: Protest Songs From Bruce Springsteen, My Morning Jacket, NOFX, and Others - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Bruce Springsteen, My Morning Jacket, and more have written ICE protest songs following the deaths of U.S. citizens and violence ICE has perpetuated.

articles.title: Trump Administration Claps Back at Bruce Springsteen Over “Irrelevant” Anti-ICE Protest Song - hollywoodreporter.com

articles.description: All four films are currently set for release on April 7, 2028

articles.title: Oscar Season’s Messy Side Comes for ‘Marty Supreme’ - hollywoodreporter.com
articles.description: The nine-time Oscar nominee has faced resurfaced allegations regarding its director’s conduct on a previous movie, sharp criticism from the family who inspired its main character — and suspicions of a smear campaign.

articles.title: Unable to Stop AI, SAG-AFTRA Mulls a Studio Tax on Digital Performers - Variety
articles.description: SAG-AFTRA is considering whether to seek a contribution to a union fund every time a studio uses a synthetic performer in a film or TV show.

articles.title: Mandy Patinkin Cast As Odin In Prime Video’s ‘God Of War’ - Deadline
articles.description: Mandy Patinkin has been cast as Odin in Prime Video's 'God of War,' the TV adaptation of the popular Playstation video game.

articles.title: ‘Wuthering Heights’ Director Emerald Fennell on Breaking With the Book to Cast Jacob Elordi as Heathcliff: “There Are So Many Different Takes” - hollywoodreporter.com
articles.description: Elordi and Margot Robbie, who star in the adaptation of Emily Brontë's classic, joined the 'Saltburn' filmmaker at the L.A. premiere on Wednesday.

articles.title: Michael J. Fox Says Retiring in 2020 Was ‘Non-Emotional’ and Finally Acting Again Is ‘Not the Beginning of Any Campaign to Reestablish My Career’ - Variety
articles.description: Michael J. Fox says returning to acting in 'Shrinking' Season 3 is not an attempt to reestablish his Hollywood career.

articles.title: 'Vigil' review: George Saunders' brief, bumpy return to the Bardo - NPR
articles.description: The Bardo is a Tibetan Buddhist idea of a suspended state between life and death. Saunders explored the concept in his 2017 novel, Lincoln in the Bardo, and circles back to it again in his new novel Vigil.

articles.title: Former NBC producer tells her own story about Matt Lauer in 'Unspeakable Things' - NPR
articles.description: Brooke Nevils was working for NBC at the Sochi Olympics when, she says, she was sexually assaulted by Today Show host Matt Lauer — a claim he denies. Nevils' new memoir is Unspeakable Things.

articles.title: Review | Rachel McAdams takes her cutthroat comedy genius way beyond Regina George - The Washington Post
articles.description: In Sam Raimi’s “Send Help,” Rachel McAdams and Dylan O’Brien star as feuding colleagues stranded on a desert island.

articles.title: "How else do you think I can afford all this? Modeling?" - Kendall Jenner burns her NBA exes' jerseys while filming a Super Bowl commercial - Yahoo
articles.description: In one part of the spot, Jenner even burns her exes’ jerseys.

articles.title: CNN Data Guru Reveals Grim Forecast for ‘Melania’ Movie - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Harry Enten discussed the dark omens for Melania’s movie and her legacy as FLOTUS.

articles.title: Darren Aronofsky Has Reconstructed the Revolutionary War Using AI - hollywoodreporter.com
articles.description: That's the conceit of a series he made with Google DeepMind and Salesforce, which will unfurl on Time Magazine’s YouTube channel every week through the end of the year.
